award_title: Proteomic approaches and live-cell imaging reveal unique aspects of delivery of cellulose synthase complexes to the plasma membrane
subject: Question about the CSC trafficking dynamics
body:
Hi Ying,

I was reading about your work on cellulose synthase trafficking and got curious about the machine learning pieceâ€”are you using it to track the exocytosis/endocytosis patterns in your live-cell imaging data?

I'm working on Ouro, which helps researchers share computational work (workflows, datasets, notebooks) in a way that's actually reproducible and discoverable by others in your field.

Happy to get your group set up if you want to see how it works.

Best,

Matt
Founder
https://ouro.foundation
